ui.str:
-Credits-
Game by Volodymyr "Wolod" Yakubovych Powered by Construct 2 Muzt D. Studios, Ukraine, L'viv, 2018
-Super Sharp Sword- Swing it towards your foe. Haven't won yet? Repeat previous step.
-Shield of Protection- Place it in front of anything dangerous. It's as simple as that.
-Ring of Speed- Allows you to dash because walking is slow and boring.
-Ghost Amulet- Makes you invulnerable! But only after you were hurt...
-Big Red Potion- Improves health. No side effects known.
-Golden Key- Obviously, opens a door with a golden lock.
